task: Organize a comprehensive film festival in Paris with specific requirements: 1. Coordinate international travel for VIP guests using sustainable airlines. 2. Secure accommodations in eco-certified hotels. 3. Curate a screening schedule of diverse international films, ensuring representation from every continent. 4. Plan networking events focusing on cross-cultural collaborations. 5. Ensure all activities comply with international film distribution regulations. 6. Develop a marketing campaign targeting global audiences using digital platforms. 7. Conduct an analysis ensuring the entire festival's carbon footprint is neutralized. 8. Provide gourmet halal, vegan, and gluten-free catering options.

agents.name: client_agent
agents.role: The top-level agent coordinating the entire film festival organization, communicating directly with the user.

agents.name: travel_coordinator_agent
agents.role: Manages international travel and accommodation for all festival VIP guests.

agents.name: vip_transportation_agent
agents.role: Arranges sustainable air travel for VIP guests, ensuring eco-friendliness.

agents.name: sustainable_airline_analysis_agent
agents.role: Analyzes airlines for sustainability and eco-friendliness.

agents.name: eco_accommodation_agent
agents.role: Secures hotel accommodations with eco-certification for festival attendees.

agents.name: green_hotel_certification_verifier
agents.role: Verifies the green certification of selected hotels.

agents.name: film_programmer_agent
agents.role: Curates the film festival lineup, focusing on diversity and international representation.

agents.name: cultural_diversity_agent
agents.role: Ensures film selection for the festival includes global cultural representation.

agents.name: continent_representative_agent
agents.role: Oversees selection of films from each continent to maintain diverse representation.

agents.name: festival_theme_agent
agents.role: Develops thematic elements for the festival based on selected films.

agents.name: networking_event_planner_agent
agents.role: Designs networking opportunities that foster cross-cultural artistic collaborations.

agents.name: cross_cultural_collaborations_agent
agents.role: Creates networking sessions aimed at encouraging cross-cultural collaborations.

agents.name: event_logistics_agent
agents.role: Organizes logistics required for networking events at the festival.

agents.name: legal_compliance_agent
agents.role: Handles compliance with international film distribution and screening regulations.

agents.name: film_distribution_regulations_agent
agents.role: Ensures all designated films comply with distribution laws.

agents.name: regulatory_documentation_agent
agents.role: Prepares necessary documentation for regulatory compliance.

agents.name: marketing_director_agent
agents.role: Directs the festival's marketing strategy, focusing on global audience reach.

agents.name: digital_platform_agent
agents.role: Manages global campaign engagement across digital platforms.

agents.name: environmental_impact_agent
agents.role: Assesses and neutralizes the carbon footprint of the film festival.

agents.name: carbon_footprint_analysis_agent
agents.role: Analyzes and aids in offsetting the festival's carbon footprint.

agents.name: carbon_offset_strategy_agent
agents.role: Develops strategies to neutralize the festival's overall carbon footprint.

agents.name: culinary_agent
agents.role: Organizes catering with special diet options, including halal, vegan, and gluten-free menus.

agents.name: special_dietary_requirements_agent
agents.role: Ensures catering options meet diverse dietary needs and ethical standards.

agents.name: gourmet_catering_agent
agents.role: Focuses on providing gourmet-level catering with diverse dietary options.

agents.name: local_supplier_contact_agent
agents.role: Connects with local suppliers to source ingredients for catering.

tools.name: audience_engagement_analysis_tool
tools.description: Analyzes engagement metrics to optimize marketing strategies.

engagement_metrics.description: List of engagement metrics to analyze.

suggested_improvements.description: Potential enhancements for improving campaign reach.

tools.name: carbon_offsetting_tool
tools.description: Calculates and analyzes offsets for carbon emissions.

flight_distance.description: Distance of the flight in kilometers.
